title: [PAID] [$250] LHN -  Large part of the LHN isn't translated to Spanish if setting changed on a secondary device
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Main device: Log in with an account that has an archived workspace chat and an active workspace
2. Main device: Navigate to the LHN
3. Secondary device: Log in with the same account
4. Secondary device: Navigate to Account settings - Preferences - Language
5, Secondary device: Set the language to Spanish

Expected result: The LHN should be fully translated to Spanish

Actual result: None
